snippet.title: 3DS : Seisou no Amazones (JAP)
snippet.description:
Seisou no Amazones (星霜のアマゾネス) is a turn based RPG with dungeon crawler elements that developed and published by Arc System Works
back in 2013, exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS handheld system and the Japanese market.

Gantai (main heroine) is a prisoner on the planet Ulka which is located at the edge of the universe. This planet is so strictly secured that is almost impossible to escape from there. But Gantai has a unique plan. According to a rumour there is a spaceship somewhere around the planet (from an ancient civilization) and of course, she will search for it at any cost.
During her adventure she will also find the answer why there aren't men in the world of Amazones.
